document_data.mainbody:
he Lords of War and Victory was a religious organization of elite crusaders who worshiped Gilgeam, the Supreme Ruler of Unther.
As with all organizations devoted to Gilgeam that survived the Godswar, the Lords of War and Victory were based within the Citadel of Black Ash in the Smoking Mountains of Unther.
The order was composed of 200 crusaders during the mid-to-late 14 century DR. They guarded the entrances to the Citadel of Black Ash and used the nearby Black Ash Plain to drill and train. Crusaders of the Lords of War and Victory were recognizable for their black scale armor or plate mail and full helms shaped to resemble their gods visage.
